headline: Alliant Energy Corporation (LNT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Alliant Energy Corporation on MaxDividends’s Substack by Serhio MaxDividends. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LNT. Alliant Energy Corporation’s share was trading at $66.53 as of February 3rd. LNT’s trailing and forward P/E were 20.92 and 19.49 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
